subject: Quick question about your RFP process
text:
Hi {first_name},

I came across your company and thought you might be interested in something that could help with your RFP process.

Propozio turns complex RFPs into polished proposals using AI and your custom templates. It's been helping companies win more proposals with way less effort.

Would you be interested in a quick 15-minute demo to see how it works?

Here's the link if you want to check it out: https://propozio.com

Best,
Anthony
